select ,sub.PRODUCT_ID,sub.BASE_REGION_ID,sub.HCLUSTER_ID, sub.CHARGE_TYPE,sub.ORDER_NUM,sub.ORDER_TIME,sub.VALID,sub.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID,product.NAME PRODUCT_NAME from MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER od left join MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION sub on od.SUBSCRIPTION_ID=sub.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_PRODUCT product on sub.PRODUCT_ID=product.ID

and user.USERNAME like CONCAT('%','${userName}','%') escape '^'

select ,sub.PRODUCT_ID,sub.BASE_REGION_ID,sub.HCLUSTER_ID, sub.CHARGE_TYPE,sub.ORDER_NUM,sub.ORDER_TIME,sub.VALID,sub.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID, product.NAME PRODUCT_NAME,region.NAME BASE_REGION_NAME,user.USERNAME USER_NAME from MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER od left join MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION sub on od.SUBSCRIPTION_ID=sub.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_PRODUCT product on sub.PRODUCT_ID=product.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_BASE_REGION region on sub.BASE_REGION_ID=region.ID left join WEBPORTAL_USER user on sub.USER_ID=user.ID
and user.USERNAME like CONCAT('%','${userName}','%') escape '^'
